name: Aringoth
stunts: Estate Management: +2 to Resources when dealing with property and business matters
Altmer Pride: +2 to Will when resisting intimidation from those he considers beneath him
Keeper of Secrets: +2 to Deceive when hiding his financial dealings
notes: Aringoth is the Altmer steward of Goldenglow Estate, a honey farm on an island near Riften. He's been secretly selling honey to competitors, cutting Maven Black-Briar out of her rightful profits. This has made him a target for the Thieves Guild in their 'Loud and Clear' operation. Aringoth is prideful, paranoid, and underestimates the guild's capabilities. He's hired mercenaries to protect the estate but doesn't realize how outmatched he is.
combat_tactics: Aringoth is not a fighter. If confronted, he'll try to flee or surrender. He relies entirely on his hired mercenaries for protection and will attempt to bargain or bribe his way out of trouble.
social_interaction: Aringoth is haughty and dismissive, especially toward Nords. He believes his Altmer heritage and position make him superior. When threatened, his pride crumbles quickly into desperation and bargaining. He's the type to beg for his life while still trying to appear dignified.

relationships.Thieves Guild: Unaware of threat until too late
relationships.Competitors: Secret business partners in honey trade

personality_notes.speaking_style: Haughty, dismissive, uses Altmer superiority, becomes desperate when threatened
personality_notes.character_growth: None - he's a one-note antagonist for the heist

story_hooks: Primary target of 'Loud and Clear' Thieves Guild quest
Must be confronted or intimidated during Goldenglow heist
Can be killed, intimidated, or left alive depending on player choice
His ledgers contain evidence of honey scheme
Serves as example of crossing Maven Black-Briar

dialogue_samples.arrogant: I don't know what you think you're doing here, but I have mercenaries. You Nord thugs don't frighten me.
dialogue_samples.desperate: Wait, wait! We can make a deal! I have gold, contacts, whatever you want!
dialogue_samples.begging: Please, I'll tell you everything! Just don't hurt me! It was only business!
dialogue_samples.confession: Yes, yes, I was selling to others! Maven's prices were too low! I needed the gold!
dialogue_samples.final_words: You have no idea what you've done. Maven will destroy everything!

heist_notes.location: Goldenglow Estate - main house, second floor bedroom
heist_notes.security: Mercenaries patrolling grounds, locked doors, safe with ledgers
heist_notes.objectives: Burn beehives (but no more than 3), clear mercenaries, obtain ledgers, confront Aringoth
heist_notes.complications: Multiple mercenaries, island location, alert level if detected
heist_notes.outcomes: Success intimidates competitors and sends message for Maven
